lead_paragraph: A man who acknowledged killing three people at a Planned Parenthood clinic in Colorado Springs said that the shooting was spur of the moment, and that he targeted the clinic because it was “murdering little babies.”
snippet: A man who acknowledged killing three people at a Planned Parenthood clinic in Colorado Springs said that the shooting was spur of the moment, and that he targeted the clinic because it was “murdering little babies.”

headline.main: Colorado: Man Says Clinic Killings Were Unplanned
headline.print_headline: Colorado: Man Says Clinic Killings Were Unplanned

abstract: Robert Lewis Dear, who killed three people at Planned Parenthood clinic in Colorado Springs, Colo, claims in phone interview with local television station that shooting was not planned.
